nodes.documentation:
** 
Checks if the caller of the contract is owner or not?
If yes, then only proceed to the Function whatever you are doing.***
nodes.name: isOwner

nodes.documentation:
** 
Checks if the caller of the contract is patient or not?
If yes, then check if the patientId of that caller is correct or not. If correct then Good,
Otherwise show the error.***
nodes.name: isPatient

nodes.documentation:
** 
Updates the doctorsAddress in the database of authorised doctors.
Along with this, check for the isOwner, if the caller is owner, then only it is allowed to Add the address.
Parameter passed -
_doctorAddress
Any other doctor can add a new doctor.***
nodes.name: addAuthorisedDoctor

nodes.documentation:
***
RemoveAuthorisedDoctor - Removes the permission of the doctor that was previously assigned the permissions.
Parameter Passes - 
_doctorAddress
Can only be removed by the Owner****
nodes.name: removeAuthorisedDoctor

nodes.documentation:
** 
Updates the doctorsAddress in the database of authorised doctors.
Along with this, check for the isOwner, if the caller is owner, then only it is allowed to Add the address.
Parameter passed -
_doctorAddress
Any other doctor can add a new doctor.***
nodes.name: addAuthorisedDoctor

nodes.documentation:
***
RemoveAuthorisedDoctor - Removes the permission of the doctor that was previously assigned the permissions.
Parameter Passes - 
_doctorAddress
Can only be removed by the Owner****
nodes.name: removeAuthorisedDoctor

addAuthorisedDoctor(address).notice: **  Updates the doctorsAddress in the database of authorised doctors. Along with this, check for the isOwner, if the caller is owner, then only it is allowed to Add the address. Parameter passed - _doctorAddress Any other doctor can add a new doctor.***

removeAuthorisedDoctor(address).notice: *** RemoveAuthorisedDoctor - Removes the permission of the doctor that was previously assigned the permissions. Parameter Passes -  _doctorAddress Can only be removed by the Owner****
